alert.note: Alert for Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 12:41AM CDT until June 07 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Central Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1240 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Springfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Portland, Orlinda, Mitchellville, Black Jack, Oak Grove and Cottontown. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 105 and 121. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
